评论详情: I wear this as a dress with a wide stretch belt. I tie the belt straps around my neck. I'm heavy and 5 ft tall.  The length is between low and mid calf. If you're really tall it would still be adorable as a shorter dress.
Pretty but shorter than expected.
Love the material in this skirt. It is lightweight and hangs beautifully.  The skirt I have is dark green and black. The fit is as expected. I would buy this skirt again.

I read the reviews and decided on the small, stretch band n all. I wear a small/medium. It fits perfectly, especially with tie front. I am wearing as I review. It is so comfortable, I forgot I was wearing it. I want to get more as soon as possible. I can't wait to give it a good go, to see how it hold up. I mean I like to dress pretty but live my life in the moment.

So the material and style of this skirt is PERFECT. I absolutely adore it. I am a pretty solid size 12 right now and 5', I ordered the 6-14 first and loved the fit but after washing it shrank around the waist enough that it is a bit more snug than I wanted. Just ordered a second one  in a different color to see how I like the 12-20 after I wash it up. Seriously though, I will be buying it in a 6-14 again if I prefer that size. It is a great summer skirt and colors are vibrant.
I love this skirt. I'm 5'1" and it is just to my ankle. There is even a short semi slip built in.
very very pretty except too long....had to pull up high.  I am 5ft4
I needed a skirt for a program, this skirt is flowy and pretty - and it fits me, I usually wear a 2X so I was worried about the fit. I recommend it.
Absolutely love this skirt/dress. I have purchased 3 colors, It has been so hot 🔥 this month, this is the only thing I wear... love to pull it up and wear it as a flowy dress
This skirt fits beautifully. Very cool material. Great for spring, summer and fall!! Love it.
Absolutely love this skirt! Great quality, super flowy and beautiful, highly recommend!

This skirt is exactly what I was looking for. I'm 5'3" and it sits at my ankles, this would also look great on a taller person. I wear it with a tank top and it's perfect for the summer. I'm going to buy another one.

I was worried it would be too small, but it fits perfectly. I was totally amazed in a great way at the wonderful quality of this skirt! It even has a slip attached! LOVE! 4 Stars. Hope you find this review and pictures helpful! The side ties look great with a tucked in shirt! I'm 5'6" and 130 lbs. Love the fit and the length!

评论概述: Average Dress with Awkward Waist Wrap.
评论详情: I ordered the Mandala in Green. The fabric is soft, okay stitching, and flows nicely. The thing I didn't like what when I went to tie the two dangling fabric pieces around my waist (this is to secure the dress, so it does not fall), the other side of the fabric does not have the outside pattern—it's just white. So when you tie the wrap at the front of your waist, you see unsightly white fabric underneath the wrap fabric and ruins the whole look. I tried to tie the waist wrap in a way that the underside would not be visible, but it's just not possible. I wish the pictures had shown this. To fix it, I may have to stitch a matching green fabric under the belt wrap. Also, two pockets would have made this dress perfect, but I already knew that this would be pocketless.

评论概述: Fit perfectly! Fabric is very comfortable and nice.

As advertised- I will need shoe with 2” heel as it runs long - I’m 5’4”- I like it
This is even better than I expected! You can wear it to church and then on vacation it can be worn as a sundress.

I have several of these skirts. I like them because they have a slip in them. I will say that are long and can sometimes hit the floor. I am 5' 4" and 150lbs I buy the 14-16 because I am big in the hips and I don't like it to be tight. When I was 130, I wore the smaller size, but I now would get the medium when I lose the weight, just to have it be less tight. I wash cold water and hang dry. I get tons of compliments when I wear them.

评论概述: CHEAP but you know that going in....
评论详情: Cute. Trendy so wear it a lot because next summer, this will be out of style. VERY long and it took me three hours to cut and hem it. Cheaply made of very cheap fabric and it must be hand washed and air dried. Do not put in the dryer. The wrinkles will remain. Light ironing just makes it static-like and way too puffy. Just a fun thing to throw on to go to the beach or a summer gathering.

Very heavy weight fabric hung on my body like a wet blanket. Fabric not breathable. So long it touches the floor. Not something I even considered shortening. Probably 6 yards of material sweep. Not suggested for anyone under 5'7".
I absolutely love the pattern of this skirt.  The elastic around the waist is comfortable too.

Skirt is as expected, though material is a little rough and holds wrinkles very stubbornly. As a curvy girl, I chose to modify the skirt by removing the elastic rows at the top since it accentuated my belly most unflatteringly and because I will never be wearing this as a dress. It would be nice for the skirt to come with an option to forego that ruching since we aren't all lucky enough to be stick thin with flat stomachs! But the real disappointment was the way it was shipped. Just a label slapped on the inventory bag, mostly transparent, not sealed, clearly readable labels identifying exactly what's in the package and even what size. In this age of porch pirates, you'd think someone would have better sense than to ship this way. Will not be ordering from this company again.
It's very long and the material is cheap.

I rarely buy skirts (especially long ones) online, but this skirt is amazing! It is light and comfortable and covers my ankles unlike most skirts do. The waistband is stretchy and very comfortable. Mine isn't see-through like some other reviews say, and includes the white liner that goes to about mid-thigh.
The pattern is vibrant and the skirt is cute, but the length and fit is awkward. The ties do not work well or lay right.

I really like the summer comfort of this skirt. I own it in 3 colors. It is more "boho" but not too boho if that's not your vibe. The waist is wide and I use the ties to keep it in place. I'm 5' 3" so it does sit over my belly to make the length work.
Fits perfectly and vey comfortable
Love the way I can wear it as both a skirt and a dress

I’m 5’2” and was looking for a skirt that would hir me just above my ankles without my having to shorten it. Because I can wear this pulled up just over waist level, it is perfect. Add the flowiness and it’s now my favorite skirt.

The skirt is beautiful! The color is just what I expected. I am 5'3" and 200 lb. The skirt runs a bit long but not too bad. It does not drag on the ground. The material is soft and comfortable. Very pretty green medallion pattern skirt. Lightweight, but not see-thru. Most important the fabric, although synthetic is not staticky or clingy.  It’s versatile in that it can be worn as a dress or skirt.  I’m 5’4” and the skirt hits the top of my instep—so it’s a bit longer than I’d like.
fit perfect

This skirt is very flattering and looks way better in person than in the picture, which is always an awesome surprise. Everytime I wear it people ask me where I bought it and when I tell them Amazon they order it right away. I will mention one thing, when you wear it make sure to wear a fitted shirt (or bathing suit if you're going to be near water) and tuck it in. Then wear the skirt as high wasted as you feel comfortable. I have had friends try to wear it low and with a loose shirt and they hated it until I told them to tuck it. And don't worry if you have a bit of a belly bc the knotted fabric on top makes it very flattering.

I love it, very comfortable.  Love the way it looks.

As a skirt it is great for a casual dinner or walk along the boardwalk. If you want to use this as a dress the ties can either go under the bust or around the neck like a halter top. A short liner keeps it from being too sheer. The stretchy ruching makes for a comfortable fit. Update: I dropped this to 3 stars because even though I washed this on the delicate cycle, that caused about a 1” tear in the seam between skirt and stretchy part. I know the directions said to hand wash but I feel it should be a little more durable. It is an easy fix but does speak to the quality of the product.
This dress is cute, comfortable,  washes nicely and I love that it is also a dress!
